name: Headless Dungeon
description:
After a stroke of bad luck your adventuring party starts to question your abilities as a leader. Can you lead them through their next dungeon without completely losing control or even worse lives?

Your party will do whatever they want. You can only lead them by providing a path they should take. You have to know your party well to predict what challenges they can face and what problems might cost you your head as a group leader.

  • Move camera: WASD or arrow keys
  • Zoom camera: Mouse wheel
  • Move party: Click on nearby room
  • Win condition: 50 Control
  • Lose condition: 0 Control or all party members at 0 health or at 0 energy

We only did the programming during the JAM. Art and music are from other sources.

Music:

  • Facing the nightmare - created by Human Antagonist soundcloud.com/humanantagonist
  • The next level - created by Human Antagonist soundcloud.com/humanantagonist
